trans-unit.source: Defines an interface for all items added to the .NET script engine, including code items, reference items, and global items.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个接口为添加到.NET 脚本引擎，包括代码项、 引用项和全局项的所有项。

trans-unit.source: It defines generic properties and methods that apply to all item types recognized by the engine.
trans-unit.target: 它定义的泛型属性和适用于该引擎识别的所有项类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets implementation-specific options for a script engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取脚本引擎特定于实现的选项。

trans-unit.source: The name of the option to retrieve.
Returns the value of the specified option.
Returns a value indicating whether the current in-memory representation of the item differs from the persisted representation.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前内存中项的表示形式是否与保留的表示形式不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is dirty, and thus requires saving; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the item is not dirty.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果项是否已更新，并因而需要保存; 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果该项未更新。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified object's type, as determined by the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItems.CreateItem*> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的对象的类型，所确定的那样<xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItems.CreateItem*>方法。</xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItems.CreateItem*>

trans-unit.source: A type as enumerated by the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType"></xref> enumeration.
Sets or gets the name of the item.
Returns the string literal name of the item.
trans-unit.target: 返回的项的字符串名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets implementation-specific options for a script engine.
trans-unit.target: 设置脚本引擎特定于实现的选项。

trans-unit.source: The name of the option to set.
A new value for the option.
